index.mainDescription: CitizenLove connects people that can help with people in need. Post your help request if you need help!

receiveHelp.mainDescription: Your location will not be shared with anyone. We only use it to notify people near you that want to help.
receiveHelp.categoryTitle: What do you need help with?

receiveHelp2.formDescTitle: In one sentence: What do you need?
receiveHelp2.formDescDescription: Write your sentence in a way so helpers immediately understand what you need
receiveHelp2.formDescPlaceholder: e.g. Look after my kids Monday
receiveHelp2.formDetailsDescription: Add the details of your needs here.
receiveHelp2.formDetailsPlaceholder: I need someone to look after my kids during the day because I have to work at the hospital.
receiveHelp2.formDetailsError: Please tell us what you need.
receiveHelp2.formEmailDescription: We will send the contact details of people offering help to this e-mail address. The E-Mail address will not be shared with anyone.
receiveHelp2.formEmailError: Please provide a correct email address.

receiveHelpConfirm.mainDescription: Our helpers will contact you shortly by e-mail!
receiveHelpConfirm.mainExplanation: You will receive an e-mail to {email} with a copy of your request.

register.mainTitle: Give a helping hand - register now!
register.locationDescription: Provide the location where you would like to provide help around.
register.radiusDescription: Provide in which radius you want to be notified.
register.emailDescription: We will send help requests from people in need to this address.
register.phoneDescription: In a later version we would like to send help requests to your phone numbers so that you can help faster. If you want, you can enter it already.

registerHelpConfirm.mainDescription: We will notify you when there is someone in your area who needs help!
registerHelpConfirm.mainExplanation: You will receive an e-mail to {email} with a copy of your request.
